title: OT42: Thread Anniversary
summary:
Key ideas:
- The author is celebrating the third anniversary of his blog and takes the opportunity to thank people who have contributed to its success.
- He thanks website/app design company Trike Apps for hosting the site.
- The author thanks those who have helped with technical work and those who have sponsored the blog.
- He expresses gratitude towards those who have read and engaged with his blog and those who have helped build the community.

Key learnings:
- The author recommends Trike Apps for anyone launching a website.
- Sponsors can contribute to a blog's success.
- Building a community around a blog can lead to success and growth.

- None mentioned in this specific excerpt.
